name: 62_supply_chain_vendor_failure_early_warning_from_latencies
messages_sequence: Email: Vendor reply times slowing; more after-hours messages.
Logistics: ASN variance up; partial shipments more frequent; QC defects creeping up.
Finance: Invoice errors; vendor demanding shorter payment terms.
Social signals: Glassdoor shows uptick in negative reviews referencing layoffs.
Business context: Vendor supplies ~40% of SKUs.
